stringified:
Replace | string,searchValue,replaceValue | value | IMPLICIT | NONE
({ string, searchValue, replaceValue }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.replace(searchValue, replaceValue))

original.runFnString:
({ string, searchValue, replaceValue }, { value }) =>
    value.next(string.replace(searchValue, replaceValue))

alternativeFunction: function ({ inputString, searchValue, replaceValue }, { outputString }) => { outputString.next(inputString.replace(searchValue, replaceValue)) }
